title: Andy Rubin: Essential Phone release date to be revealed next week | Trusted Reviews
description: ![]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * It now seems we can expect to see the phone arriving either at the end ofAugust, or possibly in September, and it’s going to have some toughcompetition.Apple is gearing up to announce the [iPhone8](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/iphone-8-release-date-specs-rumours-price-uk-2993101), likely next month, and Google is also working on a follow-up to its Pixel phone, the [Pixel2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/g00/news/google-pixel-2-release-date-specs-rumours-price-uk-xl-2951055?i10c.referrer=), which is expected to launch inthe next few months.Best Buy and Amazon will be stocking the phone in the US when it launches,with Amazon recently investing in the company.International carriers are expected to be announced at a later date, but weknow the device will cost $699 in the states.Elsewhere, Essential president Niccolo De Masi spoke to the [Wall StreetJournal](https://www.wsj.com/articles/amazon-and-tencent-back-smartphone-maker-essential-1502283648?mod=e2twd), saying: “If we are able to sell lowsingle digit millions [in the first year], that’s very successful for astartup.”At this point, we’re still awaiting that concrete release date, but it seemswe’ll be finding out more within a week, so stay tuned.**Tweet us your thoughts on the Essential Phone @trustedreviews.**
